title: Windows 8.1 X64 Enterprise with Update ESD OEM en-US Mar 2015 by
description:
[b]Windows 8.1 X64 Enterprise with Update ESD OEM en-US Mar 2015


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81.X64.Ent.ESD.en-US.Mar2015.iso

* Source: dvd 6054382

* Size: 4,06GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 46fb0243
* MD5: a0f929c0c7182ec81477728f51b6c3ea
* SHA-1: a57b7b70b2cc86c20758ca69bcb2015ba4b4b244

* Language: en-US [English - USA]

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Enterprise
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise - - OEM-Activated

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* Hotfixes - 2015-03-10

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* Defender Updates
* KB890830

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB 2.0 (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

[ OEM ACTIVATION INFO ]

* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically activate
* (if HP, Asus, Toshiba, etc), and input manufacturers login screen,
* wallpaper, system properties logo and User Account logo.

* If you choose non-OEM (eg Custom Build) you can activate with
* KMSpico in WPI screen at end of install.

* Testing has shown that if you choose OEM for Custom Build, wallpaper,etc still
* gets applied but will not automatically activate. In this instance use KMS.

[ Activation & application information ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

* All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers
* that will install the latest available version for you.

* Web installers requires connection to internet.

* To activate, select "KMSpico".

* Choose any optional application(s).

* Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.

* To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".

* Activator: KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition
[ Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]


[ Optional software ]

* Google Chrome
* Mozilla Firefox
* Opera Chromium
* 7-zip 9.30
* Adobe Reader
* DirectX
* Flashplayer
* Java JRE
* Notepad++
* TeamViewer
* WinRAR 5.21
* GOM Player
* VLC Player
* Winamp


* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 [/b]
